alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Perry (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 07 at 10:07AM CST until February 08 at 7:30PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Leaf Near Mclain affecting George, Perry and Greene Counties. For the Leaf River...including Mclain, New Augusta...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Leaf Near Mclain. * WHEN...Until Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Considerable flooding of agricultural and lowlands near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 19.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon and continue falling to 12.0 feet Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
